name: eclosion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an insect) the act of coming out of an egg, or out of a pupal case (= the hard covering in which an adult insect develops): adult eclosion After adult eclosion, the sex of each insect was recorded. Immediately after egg eclosion, the newly hatched larvae start feeding.
More examplesFewer examplesThe egg eclosion rate was measured.Newly emerged adults are brown, but they become black a few days after eclosion.Eclosion of the adult moth in the laboratory was compared with eclosion in the field.After the eggs are laid, time to eclosion is between five and seven days.Adult eclosion usually occurs at night.
